text: Wo ba tamen fen wei shi'erzhi pai, ji buluo. Dang mu sa de zongzu xiang ta qiu shui de shihou, wo qishi ta shuo:`Ni yong ni de shouzhang da na panshi ba.'Shi'er gu quanshui jiu cong na panshi li yongchu lai, ge buluo dou zhidao ziji de yinshui chu. Wo yi baiyun yinbi tamen, you jiangxia ganlu he anchun gei tamen.(Wo dui tamen shuo):`Nimen keyi chi wo suo gongji nimen de jiamei de shiwu.'Tamen meiyou kuifu wo, dan tamen zi kuile.
